Package oop2.jeopardy.report

Class TxtReportGenerator

java.lang.Object
oop2.jeopardy.report.TxtReportGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
ReportGenerator
public class TxtReportGenerator extends Object implements ReportGenerator
Generates reports in TXT format.

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

  • Constructor Details

    • TxtReportGenerator

  • Method Details

    • generate

      public void generate(GameHistory history, String filename) throws Exception
      Generates a plain-text report summarizing the provided GameHistory.

      The output includes a header, game overview, player summaries, final scores, statistics, accuracy breakdown, and turn-by-turn history. Automatically appends ".txt" extension if not present.

      Specified by:
      generate in interface ReportGenerator
      Parameters:
      history - the game history to summarize
      filename - the output file path
      Throws:
      Exception - if an I/O error occurs while writing the file
      NullPointerException - if history or filename is null

    • wrap

      private String wrap(String text)
      Wraps a long string into multiple lines for text-based reports. Simple wrapping for long text

      Lines longer than WRAP_WIDTH are broken and indented for readability.

      Parameters:
      text - the input text to wrap
      Returns:
      the wrapped text
